game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a powerful artifact is buried deep within an abandoned ruin. Your quest is to explore the area, overcome any challenges, and retrieve the artifact.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical scroll

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You need to search the dense forest for any signs of ancient structures or pathways that lead to the hidden ruins.
task.location: Northwest corner of the Forest of Whispers

task.description: A fierce creature guards the entrance to the ruins. You must defeat it to proceed.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and find the artifact
task.description: Navigate through the treacherous corridors of the ancient ruin, solving puzzles and avoiding traps to locate the artifact.
